name: trgtgp

stmt.origin: simp1bi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd))
stmt.pretty: simp1bi(c0 ∈ TopRing, c0 ∈ TopGrp, c0 ∈ Ring, (mulGrp ` c0)∈ TopMnd)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c0, ctgp))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctrg), w3a(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c0 ∈ TopGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing ↔(c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c0 ∈ Ring ∧(mulGrp ` c0)∈ TopMnd))

⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing ↔(c0 ∈ TopGrp ∧ c0 ∈ Ring ∧(mulGrp ` c0)∈ TopMnd))

|- wb(wcel(c0, ctrg), w3a(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd)))
-| wceq(cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0))

comment: A topological ring is a topological group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
